sentence: Loved having the pool just down the hallway
We stayed on the 7th floor which was very near the pool
Indoor pool was great
They had nice seating with magazines so that parents could relax while watching over kids if not swimming
We found the co ed aspect convenient since we had the pool almost entirely to ourselves but even though I have lived in continental Europe over a dozen years I dislike shared facilities
Indoor pool was nice for the kids to play and the hotel has been nicely updated in the main areas
Very well appointed gym and comfortable pool spa indoors

Great place to stay with kids the staff did not even blink when my son spilled his milk in the restaurant the heated indoor pool was a haven for kids of all ages in the hotel and there was plenty of room for him to run around the spacious property
Nice lobby and social work area with plenty of outlets to plug your lap top or mobile device to get a charge and a Starbucks to fuel your caffeine needs
loved the indoor swim pool and jacuzi
Heck if I had swam in the pool I am sure Jaws would have attacked me
Pool was freezing cold
The pool was really cold the water should maybe be warmer for an indoor pool
The fact the indoor pool was freezing and the hot tub was out of order withn the most disgusting white film just floating on top

Very disappointed with pool which was freezing the jacuzi was hot but not full enough resulting in scum line around top and loud vents blowing out around your ears that should have been below water level
The pool was clean but the hot tub was making a terrible noise
Booked this hotel for the indoor pool to only find out it was n’t open are entire stay
A lot of noise caused by the pool repair
No menu in room or booklet with info about place and what it offers there was NO POOL OR SAUNA
THEY HAVE A POOL WHEN THEY DONT ANYMORE I WAS VERY
